raw_text:
Messages exported from: Blaine McGregor iPhone 16 (blainemcgregor@icloud.com)
With: Group Chat: Brittany Gilliland new (3349917778), 3346180033
PDF generated on 2/9/2025 using Decipher TextMessage
8/20/2024 7:57 AM (Viewed 8/20/2024 9:01 AM)
3346180033
Good morning to both of you. This is Kelly Turner. Blaine I
am the therapist that will be doing the reunification therapy
per the court recommendations. We had our first session
yesterday scheduled. Sorry that missed AK. We will have our
next session on 9/4 at 3:00.
Please reply Y to confirm .
8/20/2024 9:10 AM
Blaine McGregor iPhone 16 (blainemcgregor@icloud.com)
Hi Kelly! We don’t have a court order as of yet & some of the
details are actually still being worked through.
I’ve been very clear with Brittany that the reunification
therapist we select should have no prior history with either AK
or Brittany.
We have to work together in scheduling these appointments
as Addie Kate can’t miss school once per week. I also need to
work around both kids school related activities, extracurricular
activities, arranging pickups for Bennett, & I also have a full
time job that I have to consider as well.
8/20/2024 9:18 AM
Blaine McGregor iPhone 16 (blainemcgregor@icloud.com)
I also informed Brittany last week that until we decide on a RT
that she shouldn’t make any appointments. Additionally AK &
Bennett are sick & they had doctors appointments yesterday
at 4pm. I informed Brittany about the appointments yesterday
morning. Don’t want you to think that all of this wasn’t
communicated to Brittany prior to yesterday’s appointment.
8/20/2024 9:24 AM (Viewed 8/20/2024 9:25 AM)
3346180033
She did mention the kids were sick hope everyone is feeling
better
However I did want to set up the next session to get this going
as I’ve have seen the summation/ recommendations from
court although we are waiting on the final order.
Once we are established we can shoot for 4:00 sessions to
avoid missing school . Thank you .
1
8/20/2024 9:28 AM
Blaine McGregor iPhone 16 (blainemcgregor@icloud.com)
Once we have confirmation from the court & have selected
a therapist we can setup the sessions. Again, I think it’s best
to select a RT that neither have history with & that’s local to
our area as traveling an hr each way every week is going to be
difficult.
8/20/2024 9:30 AM (Viewed 8/20/2024 5:32 PM)
3346180033
We do not have a history that I’m aware of so no issue there.
8/20/2024 9:32 AM
Blaine McGregor iPhone 16 (blainemcgregor@icloud.com)
No sessions with Brittany prior to starting the RT? I’ve asked
Brittany a few times but she hasn’t responded.
11/12/2024 4:57 PM
Blaine McGregor iPhone 16 (blainemcgregor@icloud.com)
Hi Kelly!
AK has an existing appointment for comprehension, that we’ve
waited weeks for. Brittany was informed of this appointment
several weeks ago & reminded about it just a few days ago.
Brittany purposely scheduled the RT appointment at the
same time as her behavioral appointment so I would be in
contempt.
Is there any other time between now and then that would
work?
It’s very critical that Addie Kate go to her appointment.
I’ve expressed to Brittany that I’m 100% flexible & will have her
there but please schedule anytime other than the time of AKs
existing appointment.
